00026 struct b2GearJointDef : public b2JointDef
00027 {
00028         b2GearJointDef()
00029         {
00030                 type = e_gearJoint;
00031                 joint1 = NULL;
00032                 joint2 = NULL;
00033                 ratio = 1.0f;
00034         }
00035 
00037         b2Joint* joint1;
00038 
00040         b2Joint* joint2;
00041 
00044         float32 ratio;
00045 };
